mapper.select: SELECT 1 FROM user u JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE r.name = 'SuperAdmin' AND u.id = #{userId} AND u.status = 1 AND r.status = 1 LIMIT 1

SELECT p.id, p.auth_key, p.name, p.type, p.status, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM user u JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.status = 1 JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.id AND r.status = 1 JOIN role_permission rp ON r.id = rp.role_id JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id AND p.status = 1 WHERE u.id = #{userId}
SELECT r.id, r.name, r.status, r.create_time, r.update_time FROM user u JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.status = 1 AND r.status = 1
